snippet: Readers respond to a recent review of Mark Danner’s “Spiral: Trapped in the Forever War” and more....
abstract: Letter from author and former New York Times editor Max Frankel responds to David Nasaw's July 10 review of Larry Tye book Bobby Kennedy: The Making of a Liberal Icon.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to a recent review of Mark Danner’s “Spiral: Trapped in the Forever War” and more.

keywords.value: Bobby Kennedy: The Making of a Liberal Icon (Book)
